snippet: Anheuser-Busch will fly 1,000 young adults to a Colorado ski town for a weekend of spring-break-style revelry, a stunt designed to publicize Bud Light.
abstract: Crested Butte Journal; Anheuser-Busch is taking over bucolic Colorado ski town of Crested Butte, Colo, to film beer commercial to publicize Bud Light brand; company plans to fly in 1,000 young adults for spring-break-style weekend party, which has local residents outraged, even as town officials are welcoming revenue and jobs event will bring.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch will fly 1,000 young adults to a Colorado ski town for a weekend of spring-break-style revelry, a stunt designed to publicize Bud Light.

headline.main: Town Becomes a Beer Ad, but Residents Don’t Feel Like a Party
headline.print_headline: Town Becomes a Beer Ad, but Residents Don’t Feel Like a Party
